reference.title: serviced backup
reference.shortdesc: The serviced backup command saves a snapshot of the current state of the system, the state of all services, and application data to a compressed tar archive file (.tgz).

section.title: USAGE
section.p: You can backup the entire system, or exclude certain directories, such as a directory that contains application performance data. For more information and examples, see .
